sentences.en: Conclusion flail chest caused by multiple fractured ribs should be treated by internal fixation.
sentences.cn: 结论对于引起胸壁不稳定的多发性肋骨骨折应行可吸收肋骨钉内固定治疗.

sentences.en: Danilo galloped up in silence, holding a drawn dagger in his left hand, and thrashing the heaving sides of his chestnut horse with his riding whip, as though it were a flail.
sentences.cn: 丹尼洛默不作声地疾驰，左手中持着一柄拔出的短剑，像用连枷打谷似的用那条短柄长鞭抽打着栗色大马的收缩进去的两肋。

sentences.en: I wield the flail of the lashing hail, And whiten the green plains under.
sentences.cn: 我挥动冰雹的连枷，把绿色的原野捶打得有如银装素裹；

sentences.en: Knight assigned to guard Heigm Castle . Wields a Flame Flail . Was killed by and his battalion.
sentences.cn: 守卫王都海姆正门的骑士,持有火焰链枷. 死于德尼姆军的攻击下.

sentences.en: Objective : To sum up our experiences in the treatment of traumatic flail chest.
sentences.cn: 目的: 总结创伤性浮动胸壁的治疗体会.

sentences.en: The son silently took a flail and they began threshing with four flails.
sentences.cn: 儿子也开始悄悄乘枷脱粒四枷.

sentences.en: This is an additional head which may be added to Flail of Ages + 3.
sentences.cn: 这是个额外的连枷头可能可以加装到传古连枷+3上.

sentences.en: We don't know of any other species that uses its body like a flail.
sentences.cn: 我们并不清楚其他任何鸟类种群是否将身体充当连枷。

trans.tran_cn: 连枷（脱粒用的工具），扫雷装置
trans.tran_en: a tool consisting of a stick that swings from a long handle, used in the past to separate grain from wheat by beating it
to beat someone or something violently, usually with a stick
